member.name: T:ContractUtils.ConfigParams
member.summary: Contains the assembly-wide configuration parameters specified in the accompanying config file

member.name: F:ContractUtils.ConfigParams.DefaultGas
member.summary: The default gas value (0x6691b7)

member.name: F:ContractUtils.ConfigParams.DefaultGasPrice
member.summary: The default gas price (0x77359400)

member.name: F:ContractUtils.ConfigParams.DefaultValue
member.summary: The default transaction value (zero)

member.name: F:ContractUtils.ConfigParams.NodeUrl
member.summary: The default Ethereum node url

member.name: T:ContractUtils.ContractUtil
member.summary: Contains useful functions to deploy and manage Ethereum contracts and function calls using Nethereum

member.name: F:ContractUtils.ContractUtil.Web3
member.summary: The Web3 object used to interface with

member.name: F:ContractUtils.ContractUtil.Node
member.summary: The Ethereum node interface

member.name: M:ContractUtils.ContractUtil.GetWalletAddressFromGanacheLog(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the specified Ganache-Cli wallet address
member.param: The path of the file containing the Ganache-Cli output
The wallet index between 0 and 9 (the default is 0)
The timeout in seconds for the file to be found (default is 120)

member.name: M:ContractUtils.ContractUtil.UnlockWallet(System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Unlocks the specified wallet using the given password
member.param: The address of the wallet to unlock
The password of the wallet
The operation timeout in seconds

member.name: M:ContractUtils.ContractUtil.GetReceipt(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the transaction receipt from the specified transaction
member.param: The hash of the transaction whose receipt to obtain
The maximum number of retries if an error occurs

member.name: M:ContractUtils.ContractUtil.DeployContract(System.String,System.String,System.String,Nethereum.Hex.HexTypes.HexBigInteger,Nethereum.Hex.HexTypes.HexBigInteger,Nethereum.Hex.HexTypes.HexBigInteger,System.Int32,System.Object[])
member.summary: Deploys the specified contract into the current node specified in the config file
member.param: The JSON ABI of the contract
The compiled bytecode of the contract
The wallet address of the contract owner
The gas value
The gas price
The initial value of the contract
The maximum number of retries if an error occurs
The values to pass to the contract constructor

member.name: M:ContractUtils.ContractUtil.DeployContract(System.String,System.String,Nethereum.Hex.HexTypes.HexBigInteger,Nethereum.Hex.HexTypes.HexBigInteger,Nethereum.Hex.HexTypes.HexBigInteger,System.Int32,System.Object[])
member.summary: Deploys the specified contract into the current node specified in the config file
member.param: The path to the JSON ABI of the contract that is generated by Truffle
The wallet address of the contract owner
The gas value
The gas price
The initial value of the contract
The maximum number of retries if an error occurs
The values to pass to the contract constructor

member.name: M:ContractUtils.ContractUtil.DeployContract(System.String,System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Deploys the specified contract using default values into the current node specified in the config file
member.param: The path to the JSON ABI of the contract that is generated by Truffle
The wallet address of the contract owner
The values to pass to the contract constructor
